attributes.action: To make the tram/train crossing connecting Bestwood Village and Bulwell Hall, Hucknall SAFE to use
attributes.additional_details: We are looking for safer facilities for the train tram crossing connecting Bestwood Village and Bulwell Hall, Hucknall. Too many lives are being lost including Tragic Lindsey Inger who was killed on 28th November 2012 a young 13 year old girl who could not see or hear a tram coming its awful, we cant replace lives but lets stop more being lost come on people most of us use this facilty and know its unsafe lets put a stop to the negligence from NET!!
